mapper.update: update dog set dogName=#{dogName}, kind=#{kind}, weight=#{weight}, birth=#{birth}, gender=#{gender}, neutering=#{neutering}, experience=#{experience}, memo=#{memo}, size=#{size}, skin=#{skin}, heart=#{heart}, marking=#{marking}, mounting=#{mounting}, bite=#{bite}, dogImg=#{dogImg} where dogNo=#{dogNo}
mapper.insert:
insert into review values (null, #{bNo}, #{uNo}, #{rsNo}, #{star}, #{rContent}, #{rDate}, 0)
select last_insert_id()
insert into reviewimg (riNo, rNo, saveName) values (null, #{rNo}, #{saveName})
mapper.update: update users set uPoint=uPoint+1000 where uNo=#{uNo}
mapper.select: select r.rNo, r.bNo, r.uNo, r.rsNo, r.star, r.rContent, r.rDate, r.views, ri.riNo, ri.saveName, u.uId, res.dogNo , d.dogName, d.weight from review r join reviewimg ri on r.rNo=ri.rNo join users u on u.uNo=r.uNo join reserve res on res.rsNo=r.rsNo join dog d on d.dogNo=res.dogNo where bNo=#{bNo} group by ri.rNo
mapper.update: update review set views=views+1 where rNo=#{rNo};
mapper.select: SELECT r.rNo, rs.rtNo, u.uId, r.star, r.rContent, r.rDate, r.views, rs.expectedPrice, d.dogNo, d.dogName, d.weight, b.bNo FROM review r JOIN users u ON r.uNo = u.uNo JOIN reserve rs ON rs.rsNo = r.rsNo JOIN dog d ON d.dogNo = rs.dogNo join business b on r.bNo=b.bNo WHERE r.rNo = #{rNo}
select b.bNo, b.bPhone, b.bAddress, b.bdAddress, b.title ,b.logo from business b where b.bNo=1
select b.weightDiv, b.beauty , p.onePrice, p.priceNo, p.beautyNo from beautylist b join price p on b.beautyNo=p.beautyNo where p.bNo=#{bNo} and b.sizeDiv=#{sizeDiv}
select b.weightDiv, b.beauty , p.onePrice, p.priceNo, p.beautyNo from beautylist b join price p on b.beautyNo=p.beautyNo where p.bNo=#{bNo} and b.sizeDiv='추가요금'
mapper.insert:
insert into reserve(rsNo, dogNo, rtNo, signImg, expectedPrice ) values(null, #{dogNo}, #{rtNo}, #{signImg}, #{expectedPrice} )
select last_insert_id()
mapper.update: update users set uPoint=uPoint-#{usePoint} where uNo=#{uNo}
mapper.select: select r.rsNo, r.dogNo, r.rtNo, r.expectedPrice, rt.bNo, rt.rtDate, rt.rtTime,d.dogName, d.uNo, b.title,r.surcharge from reserve r join reserveTime rt on r.rtNo=rt.rtNo join business b on b.bNo=rt.bNo join dog d on d.dogNo=r.dogNo where d.uNo=#{uNo} limit 1

select re.rNo,re.bNo, re.uNo, re.rsNo, re.star, re.rContent, re.rDate, re.views, ri.saveName, rs.dogNo, d.dogName, rs.expectedPrice, rs.surcharge, b.title, ri.saveName from review re join reviewimg ri on re.rNo=ri.rNo join reserve rs on rs.rsNo = re.rsNo join dog d on d.dogNo=rs.dogNo join business b on b.bNo=re.bNo where re.uNo=1 group by rNo order by re.rNo desc limit 1

select r.rsNo, r.dogNo, r.rtNo, r.expectedPrice, r.attitude,r.rCondition,r.tangle,r.disliked,r.bath,r.message,rt.bNo, rt.rtDate, rt.rtTime,d.dogName, d.uNo, r.surcharge, p.pushNo, p.pushTime from reserve r join reserveTime rt on r.rtNo=rt.rtNo join business b on b.bNo=rt.bNo join dog d on d.dogNo=r.dogNo join push p on p.rsNo=r.rsNo where uNo=1 order by pushNo desc limit 1

select rs.rsNo, rs.dogNo, rs.rtNo, rt.bNo, rt.rtDate, rt.rtTime, rt.rtFinish, rs.expectedPrice, rs.surcharge, b.title, b.bPhone, b.bAddress, b.bdAddress, d.dogName, d.size, u.uNo, u.uPoint, p.pDiv, p.rsNum, p.usePoint, rsp.rspNo, rsp.priceNo, rsp.rtNo, pr.beautyNo, pr.onePrice, bl.sizeDiv, bl.weightDiv, bl.beauty, pu.pushNo, pu.pushTime, re.rNo from reserve rs join reserveTime rt on rt.rtNo=rs.rtNo join business b on rt.bNo=b.bNo join dog d on d.dogNo=rs.dogNo join users u on d.uNo=u.uNo join point p on p.uNo=u.uNo join rsPrice rsp on rsp.rsNo=rs.rsNo join price pr on pr.priceNo=rsp.priceNo join beautylist bl on bl.beautyNo=pr.beautyNo left join review re on re.rsNo=rs.rsNo left join push pu on pu.rsNo=rs.rsNo where u.uNo=1 and bl.sizeDiv != '추가요금' and rtFinish=1 group by rs.rsNo order by rs.rsNo desc

SELECT r.rNo, rs.rtNo, u.uId, r.star, r.rContent, r.rDate, r.views, rs.expectedPrice, d.dogNo, d.dogName, d.weight, b.bNo FROM review r JOIN users u ON r.uNo = u.uNo JOIN reserve rs ON rs.rsNo = r.rsNo JOIN dog d ON d.dogNo = rs.dogNo join business b on r.bNo=b.bNo WHERE r.rsNo = #{rsNo}
